title: GET_FUEL_CONSUMPTION_RATE_MULTIPLIER
content:
0xEB2131// GetFuelConsumptionRateMultiplier
float GET_FUEL_CONSUMPTION_RATE_MULTIPLIER(Vehicle vehicle);Returns the current fuel consumption rate multiplier for a vehicle.
codeBlocks:
-- Example usage for GET_FUEL_CONSUMPTION_RATE_MULTIPLIER
local veh = GetVehiclePedIsIn(PlayerPedId(), false)
local rate = GetFuelConsumptionRateMultiplier(veh)
if rate > 1.5 then
    SetFuelConsumptionRateMultiplier(veh, 1.0)
end
